detail.activeHelpText: Activates the voucher. Only active vouchers can be redeemed.

detail.discardRemainingHelpText: Any remaining value of the voucher expires as soon as the voucher has been redeemed for the first time.
detail.errorMessage: The voucher could not be saved.
detail.maxRedemptionValueHelpText:
Defines the absolute limit for a percentage deduction:

Example:

  • 10% voucher
  • max. Redemption value = 20 €
  • Cart value 500 €

Usually your customer will get a deduction of 50 €. Due to the max. redemption value, the deduction will be capped at 20 €.
detail.orderPositionNumberHelpText: When the voucher is redeemed, this number is stored as a product number in the shopping cart position of the voucher.
detail.tagHelpText: Optionally, allocate a day for the voucher.

cardTitle.conditionHelpText: Define the conditions from when a voucher can be redeemed. If no conditions have been selected, the voucher can always be redeemed.
